attributes.action: take measures to reduce the overt sexualization of children and young people, and allow them their childhood.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This may include more strict censoring of films and television productions; harsher laws governing the visibility of pornography in news-stands, advertisements etc; seriously reconsider the excessive 'sex education' in schools; amongst other measures.  The government should recognise that youth is a crucial time in character-development, which can be scarred by early sexual relations and promiscuity; allow them the safe innocence of youth that former generations benefited from.
